pr_title: Add Streaming Timeout to TransportClient Properties

timeline.bodyText: Why -1? 0 should disable it as well, right?
timeline.author: cx-super
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,6 +16,12 @@
       "doc": "Timeout in ms for this transport client. Defaults to 10s.",
       "optional": true
     },
+    {
+      "name": "streamingTimeout",
+      "type": "long",
+      "doc": "Streaming Timeout in ms for this transport client. Disabled by default (-1)",

replies.bodyText: The streaming implementation expect -1, 0 will make the request immediately timeout.
replies.author: nizarm

replies.bodyText: We probably do not have any use case to immediately timeout a request. Prefer to have 0 to disable it as other configs. But that probably belong to another changes.
replies.author: cx-super
